metadata.title: Connecting 1.8V components to the RA4L1 MCUs

sections.content:
Question:
Can I use 1.8V components with the RA4L1 Group MCUs?
Answer:
The RA4L1 Series MCUs support a wide operating voltage range of 1.6-3.6V. External components that operate at 1.8V can be easily connected to the RA4L1 MCUs. The RA4L1 also has a number of 5v tolerant I/O where 5v signals can be safely applied.
Suitable Products
RA4L1
